summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2910, for the improvement of East 69th Street from the easterly line of James' Division of Green Lake Addition to a point approximately three hundred ten (310) feet easterly therefrom, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 35213 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
